[/li][/list][vc_empty_space height="12px"][button button_text="Read More" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fpixel8es.com%2Fwpthemes%2Frigel%2Fservices%2F|||"][/vc_column][vc_column color_style="light" width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1483543977332{background-image: url(http://pixel8es.com/wpthemes/rigel/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2015/08/AboutUssec1bg-2.jpg?id=995) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_empty_space height="320px"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" gap="30" equal_height="yes" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1483614523692{background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1483616363348{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][icon_box icon_name="pixicon-eye-3" title="Our Vision" display_button="no"]Li Europan lingues es membres del sam familie. Lor separat existentie es un myth. Por scientie, musica, sport etc, litot Europa usa li sam vocabular.[/icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1483616370896{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][icon_box icon_name="pixicon-target-1" title="Our Misson" display_button="no"]Li lingues differe solmen in li grammatica, li pronunciation e li plu commun vocabules. Omnicos directe al desirabilite de un nov lingua franca:[/icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1483616378887{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}"][icon_box icon_name="pixicon-bulb-2" title="Our Strategy " display_button="no"]Li nov lingua franca va esser plu simplic e regulari quam li existent Europan lingues. It va esser tam simplic quam it va esser occidental.[/icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][title title="Our Portfolio" align="center" font_size="custom-sz"
